channel.title: mac on Icarus's Wings - A blog of oracleyue
channel.description: Recent content in mac on Icarus's Wings - A blog of oracleyue

item.title: Internet control using Little Snitch vs proxy app
item.description: In macOS, you may like to use Little Snitch to control app-specific Internet access; meanwhile the proxy app may also be used, which raises troubles on access leaking. The blog provides a good practice for your reference.

item.title: TeXShop for the minted package
item.description: This is a quick note on essential configurations of TeXShop to compile LaTeX using the minted package. It works for the operation system OS X.
